title: The breathings of life to God's spiritual Israel through a faithfull follower of the Lamb, in the regeneration and kingdome of patience and tribulation, and now a sufferer in bonds for the testimony of the Lord Iesus, known to the world by the name of William Deusbury.
author: Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.
notes: Dated (p. 7): Given forth in the common goal in Warwick, the 8th day of the llth month, 1663.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
